lines.text: That <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c>- why didn't he burn up?
I mean, he was on fire at one point, judging by his robes...
But now he's not, which means that fire got put out at some point.
Point is, if he got set on fire, and then got shot, when would he have time to put out his robes?
A-any time! He- he didn't die while he was in the fire, necessarily. He could've been shot, and then- and then got out, put himself out, and then died!
...I dunno. Seems a little out of line with the picture we've been-
It's not! It's perfectly plausible! So l-let's move on!
...Well, all right. I'm sure there's bigger holes.
